name: ADIDAS Women Hispana Sandal
description:
Get ready to float in comfort and style with these lightweight Hispana floaters from adidas. Comfortable yet sturdy, these sandals are great for a stroll in the park or a walk on a trek trail.

Upper
Synthetic straps on the forefoot, collar and ankle, with velcro fastners for the forefoot and ankle straps
Padded inner lining for the straps for greater comfort
Printed logo on the forefoot and ankle strap
Cushioned footbed with slightly elevated triangle and bee hive pattern for a soft massage feel and all-day comfort

Outsole
TPR outsole with multi-directional lugs for durability, grip and traction
Flex grooves for natural movement of the feet
Curved midfoot for ergonomic comfort

name: Highlander Men Stripes Navy Blue Shirt
description:
Composition
Navy blue shirt with purple stripes, made of 100% cotton, has full sleeves with buttoned cuffs, spread collar with a buttoned front placket, patch pocket on the left chest with embroidered branding above it, and a curved hem

Fitting
Regular

Wash care
Machine wash at 40 degrees
Wash dark colours separately
Do not bleach
Tumble dry normal or line dry
Warm iron

High on casual style and designed with fashionable cuts, this stripes shirt from highlander makes for a perfect denim wear. name: Buckaroo Men Meztli Brown Casual Shoe
description:
This buckaroo men Meztli Brown Casual shoe is the essence of the brand's signature rugged style. True to its origin from the Mexican plains, this shoe is the essence of the man-about-town nonchalance. It pays tribute to the Texas cowboy lifestyle with its stitch detailing and rivets. Pair it with distressed jeans, casual check shirt and a tonal belt to subtly recapture the masculine style of the Wild West.

Upper
Full-grain leather upper for added durability and style
Contrasting leather overlay on the midfoot and heel for better support
Lace-up system for a snug, customized Fit
Rivets in the midfoot area
Lightly padded collar for in-step comfort and a snug fit
Leather lining to absorb moisture and keep feet dry
Well-cushioned nubuck footbed for all-day comfort

Midsole
EVA midsole with shock absorbers

Outsole
Slip-resistant PU outsole for better shock absorption and grip
Textured grooves on the outsole for enhanced traction
Raised heel for ergonomic comfort and style

Shoe care
Wipe surface with dry, clean cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Reid & Taylor Men Classic Brown Belt
description:
Synonymous with Scottish tradition and styling the elite for several years, Reid and Taylor's products are a class of their own. This leather belt from the brand comes in a smooth and simple design making it a classy formal wear accessory.

Length: 117 cm (including the buckle)

Crafted from pure leather with a fixed loop near the buckle
Tang clasp with five holes to customise the Fit
Brand name embossed on the tail for style

Belt care
 Blot stains using a soft clean cloth and a branded leather softening agent
If the belt gets wet, lay it flat and let it dry at room temperature
Do not wear the belt everyday as the leather will stretch and mould to the shape of your hips
Hang the belt from its buckle or curl it starting from the buckle and store away from direct sunlight do not fold the belt as the leather can crack

name: Reid & Taylor Men Stripes Navy Blue Tie
description:
Dressing the elite for years, Reid and Taylor has crafted some of the classiest accessories that rise your level of sophistication with ease. This tie from the Scottish brand is no exception. What's even better is that the fabric is treated to stay protected from stains. Wear it over well-fitting dress shirts in muted shades and crisp formals.

Length: 150 cm

Made of 100% silk for luxurious feel and light sheen
Has bright light blue stripes over a navy blue base
One loop and brand badge on the inner of the broad tongue to hold the narrow tongue in place

Tie care
Dry clean only

name: Reid & Taylor Men Solid Brown Socks
description:
It's comfort unparalleled once you slip into these dress socks from Reid and Taylor. Made of a cotton and lycra blend fabric, these socks can be worn both for work and casual outings.

Made of superfine mercerized cotton and lycra blend for all-day comfort, stretch and absorption of sweat
Rib knit mouth with a roomy toe area for superior comfort and durability
Enhanced welt for a firm grip
Brand name knit below the mouth

Sock care
Machine wash cold in 40 degree water using mild detergent
Wash dark colours separately
Do not use softeners
Do not iron, dry clean or tumble dry
Dry in shade

name: Lee Cooper Men Brown Casual Shoe
description:
It's comfort and style unparalleled once you step into this pair of leather shoes from lee cooper. Crafted from supple and durable material to offer exemplary comfort, and designed with stylish cuts, this shoe makes for a fabulous addition to your casual wardrobe. Team it with jeans and casual shirts.

Upper
Leather upper with a toe box, and has overlays on the sides of the midfoot and back foot
Perforations on the midfoot for breathable comfort
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit
Padded tongue and collar with a fabric inner lining for sweat-free comfort
Synthetic footbed with cushioning for all-day comfort
Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic

Midsole
EVA midsole for impact protection

Outsole
Durable rubber outsole with strategically placed lugs throughout the heel and forefoot for absolute grip and traction
Curved midfoot and raised heel for ergonomic comfort

Shoe care
Wipe away dust with a clean and dry cloth
Use a branded leather conditioner when needed
Do not store in direct sunlight

description:
Belived to be nike's hardest working running shoe, the nike Air Max 1 comes with that perfect blend of cushioning and stability, becoming a popular trainer at the Olympiads. With its low profile stylish upper, visible cushioning unit and grippy outsole, this shoe makes for a great buy for the serious runner.

name: Nike Men Dual Fusion ST 2 Sports Shoe
description:
With plush cushioning and a supportive Fit, the nike Dual Fusion ST 2 running shoe is perfect for runners who have a neutral to slightly overpronated gait. Lightweight and comfortable, this shoe also doubles up as a great everyday wear for those who love those long walks.

Upper
Soft, single-layer mesh for breathable comfort
Perforated, internal fit saddle work with lacing system for a comfortable, snug fit
Strategically placed overlays for lightweight support to the midfoot
Internal heel counter works with the external heel overlays to offer absolute stability
Gilly lacing system for a supportive fit and to lock the foot in place
EVA sockliner offers plush comfort and performance
Mildly cushioned footbed for all-day comfort


Midsole
Dual-density phylon midsole with softer foam in the centre and firmer foam on the perimeter for a unique blend of lightweight cushioning and enhanced support
Moulded piping on the firmer density foam to act as a crash pad for smoother transition from heelstrike

Outsole
TPR outsole with waffle pattern lugs for maximum cushioning and optimal traction on various surfaces
Forefoot flex grooves for a more natural range of motion

Shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Air Max Ultra Black Sports Shoe
description:
Inspired by the vault design, the Air Max Ultra is decked with extra cushioning to offer an easy ride for the serious runner who demands absolute comfort when running on tough terrain. The sporty upper and stylish visible cushioning unit, this sneaker also makes for a fabulously comfortable casual footwear.

Upper
Heavily meshed upper with strategically placed synthetic overlays for enhanced breathable comfort
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit
Cushioned tongue and collar for snug comfort
Padded footbed for enhanced cushioning and impact protection
Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic


Midsole
Phylon midsole with a full length visible nike Air unit for absolute shock absorption and lightweight comfort

Outsole
TPR outsole with wave grooves and strategically placed waffle pattern lugs for maximum cushioning and optimal traction on various surfaces

shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

description:
Belived to be nike's hardest working running shoe, the nike Air Max 1 comes with that perfect blend of cushioning and stability, becoming a popular trainer at the Olympiads. With its low profile stylish upper, visible cushioning unit and grippy outsole, this shoe makes for a great buy for the serious runner.

name: Nike Men Dunk High Casual Shoe
description:
Designed for superior performance and comfort, the nike Dunk High has a high heel counter to provide ample structural support to the ankle, protecting it from sprains and injuries when running. Coupled with an uber cool look is its superior traction feature that makes the nike Dunk High a huge favourite both on the track and off it. If you enjoy donning that sporty look, simply pair the Dunk High with jeans and casual tees.

name: Nike Men Supergame Black Sports Shoe
description:
Designed with stylish cuts and packed with features, the nike Supergame is a fab trainer that doesn't compromise on style. Offering all-round support, cushioning and durability even during intense work-out sessions, this sneaker is here to stay for years.

Upper
Heavily meshed upper with a fabric inner lining and synthetic overlays for enhanced shoe structure and breathable comfort
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit
Cushioned tongue and collar for a snug comfort
Cushioned footbed for enhanced cushioning and impact protection

Midsole
Phylon midsole for absolute shock absorption and lightweight comfort

Outsole
TPR outsole with strategically placed lugs for optimum grip and traction
Flex grooves for ease of movement
Scooped heel for cushioned comfort to the backfoot


Shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Air Impetus II White Sports Shoe
description:
Designed for absolute comfort, the nike Air Impetus II is an absolutely stylish running shoe for those looking for a comfortable and versatile ride. It's stylish look doubles it up as a great lifestyle footwear.

Upper
Mesh upper for maximum breathability
Synthetic overlays to add structure to the shoe and support the midfoot
Assymetrical lace-up system for snug Fit
Synthetic laces for durability and snug fit
Meshed and cushioned tongue with synthetic overlay for maximum comfort and durability
nike swooshes on side panels in synthetic and embroidered outline for support and style
Cushioned sockliner for comfortable in-step and snug fit
TPU midfoot saddle for lightweight support and comfort

Midsole
Phylon midsole for superior underfoot cushioning, offering a smooth ride
Cushioned footbed for shock absorption and impact protection
Natural Motion Engineering technology to offer an optimal ride

Outsole
Made of durable rubber to provide ample protection from shock
Waffle pattern on the forefoot to provide greater grip and traction
Nike Air hollow in the heel to provide cushioning and impact protection to the backfoot
Shank connecting forefoot and backfoot providing ample support and impact protection to foot arch
Forefoot outsole embedded onto upper as a toe guard to enhance durability and protect the toes

Wash care
Do not machine wash
Remove dust and dirt with dry clean cloth

description:

football jersey made of 100% polyester, engineered with Dri-Fit technology and Stay Cool design, has open mesh panels at the sides and closed mesh panels at the lower back, V-neck, short sleeves, rubber print nike swoosh on the right front, perforated stripe across chest, logo and team name on the back and manchester united badge printed on the front left

Regular

Dry immediately after washing

Wear your team's colours with pride - no Manchester United fan should be without this nike jersey. The striped panels in different tones of red give a stylish look to a sporty top. name: Nike Men Football Soccer Red Jacket
description:
Composition
Red jacket with an upper body made of 100% polyester in black, lower body and long sleeves made of 100% nylon in red, lining made of 100% polyester in red, mock neck, 550 Fill Down made of 75% grey duck down and 25% feathers, soft fleece cuffs extending from sleeve openings, two hand-warmer pockets at the front, zipped internal pocket for your ipod with a cord manager, trims, zipper pulls and cord locks made of recycled waste materials, nike swoosh and manchester united badge embroidered in red on the chest and Manchester United embroidered on the back

Fit
Regular

Wash care
 Machine wash cold in a gentle cycle separately using a mild detergent
Do not bleach, iron or dry clean

Do not store stuffed or wet

name: U.S. Polo Assn. Unisex Laptop Black Backpack
description:
Talk about style and space rolled into one, and there's no better Sports bag you can find than this one from US Polo. Neatly designed with lots of organiser space and laptop compartment, this bag makes for a great everyday wear to college or office.

name: Reid & Taylor Men Solid Brown Belt
description:
Synonymous to Scottish tradition and styling the elite for several years, Reid and Taylor's products are a class of their own. This leather belt from the brand comes in a smooth and simple design making it a classy formal wear accessory.

Length: 97 cm

Crafted from pure leather
Tang clasp with five holes to customise the Fit
One fixed loop to hold the tail in place
Brand name embossed on the tail

Belt care
Blot stains using a soft clean cloth and a branded leather softening agent
If the belt gets wet, lay it flat and let it dry at room temperature
Do not wear the belt everyday as the leather will stretch and mould to the shape of your hips
Hang the belt from its buckle or curl it starting from the buckle and store away from direct sunlight do not fold the belt as the leather can crack

name: Manchester United Men Solid Black Socks
description:
Specially engineered to offer maximum performance and exemplary comfort, these socks from manchester united are a great buy for those who never compromise on style and luxury. With a cushioned heel, terry base and soft seam, there's no better way to revel in the comfort of footwear. This pair of black socks has a brand name and heel in white.

Made of soft cotton fabric for a snug and secure Fit, durability and stretchable comfort
Engineered with an Air Channel system to keep the feet dry and comfortable
Footbed with power cushioning to absorb shock and impact, offering non-stop comfort
Comfort grip at the mouth to ensure a soft grip around the ankle
Soft seam at the toe region for abrasion-free and enhanced comfort
Brand name printed on the mouth

Sock care
 Machine wash in warm water using a mild detergent
Use non-chlorine bleach if needed
Tumble dry low in a delicate cycle
Do not iron

name: Fila Men Ankel Socks
description:
Specially engineered to offer maximum performance and exemplary comfort, these ankle socks from fila make for a great buy for those who never compromise on style and luxury. With a cushioned heel, terry base and soft seam, there's no better way to revel in the comfort of footwear than with this pair of socks in white with branding tipping the cuff in blue and red.

Made of soft cotton fibre blend fabric for a snug and secure Fit, durability and stretchable comfort
Engineered with an Air Channel system to keep the feet dry and comfortable
Terry base footbed with power cushioning to absorb shock and impact, offering non-stop comfort
Cushioned heel for impact protection
Comfort grip at the cuff to ensure a soft grip around the ankle
Soft seam at the toe region for abrasion-free and enhanced comfort
Brand name printed on the cuff

Sock care
Machine wash in warm water using a mild detergent
Use non-chlorine bleach if needed
Tumble dry low in a delicate cycle
Do not iron

name: Fila Men Deckers White Shoes
description:
fila specialises in high-quality sport footwear. The pair showcases the brand's versatility and ensures maximum style and comfort. Make these shoes from Fila your item du jour and wear them with jeans and a light hued tee.

Upper
Synthetic leather upper with stylised synthetic overlays for lightweight comfort
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit
Padded tongue and collar for a snug, all-day comfort

Midsole
PU midsole for lightweight comfort
Fabric footbed for sweat-free wear
Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic

Outsole
TPR outsole with geometrical lugs strategically placed for absolute grip and traction on indoor and field courts
Branding on the midfoot area
Outsole reinforced onto the upper as a heel guard for enhanced backfoot protection

shoe care
Wipe surface with a damp, clean cloth to remove dust and dirt
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Skechers Men Fusion Grey Shoe
description:
A perfect fusion of cool vintage style and practicality, the Ascoli-Fossick shoe from skechers is a fashionable casual sneaker that is a must-have in your wardrobe.

Upper
Smooth leather upper with suede overlays and smooth fabric lining
Mesh panels on the midfoot and backfoot with honeycomb style texture, and perforations on the forefoot for breathability
Slimline suede and mesh tongue
Padded collar and footbed for all-day comfort
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit

Midsole
Shock absorbing PU midsole

Outsole
Soccer inspired flexible outsole made of durable rubber, with terraced lugs and pyramid points for enhanced traction

Shoe care
Wipe surface with a clean and dry cloth to remove dust
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Skechers Men USA Brown Sandals
description:
If comfort is on your mind, the Arnold sandals from skechers transport you to heavenly bliss! Stylish and super comfy, this pair is ruggedly crafted for casual wear. Team it with jeans or shorts and step out in style.

Upper
· Leather upper for rugged feel and style
· Over-the-foot straps for added comfort
· Back strap to hold the foot firmly in place
· Contrast thread detailing for added structure and style
· Brand tab appliqued on the front
· Well cushioned footbed for all-day comfort
· Fabric lining for soft touch and protection from blisters

Midsole
EVA midsole for long-term durability and protection of feet against impact

Outsole
Rubber outsole provides durable traction on a variety of surfaces
Flex grooves for ease of movement
Lugs in the forefoot and heel region for better traction

shoe care
Use a leather brush to remove dirt
Use a branded leather conditioner
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Skechers Men USA Black Shoe
description:
With a sporty look and stylish design, this leather shoe from skechers doubles up as a perfect trainer and fashionable casual sport wear.

Upper
Leather upper with synthetic wraparound overlays that have slits to offer breathable comfort
Padded tongue and collar for a snug Fit
Lacing system for a snug, customised fit
Padded footbed for all-day comfort

Midsole
EVA midsole for impact protection

Outsole
TPR outsole with lugs and grooves on the forefoot,and grooves on the heel for absolute grip and traction


Shoe care
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner if needed
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Skechers Men Tone-Ups Black Shoe
description:
Run less, get more with the skechers Tone-Ups Trainer. Fab to look and a great gift for the feet, this pair of shoe is designed with the best of technologies to offer exemplary comfort and health quicker. This shoe is built with Kinetic Core Tri-Density technology that has a progressive suspendion system to naturally maneuver, comfort and cushion the foot, bettering the body's natural gait.

This pair comes with a CD and a booklet that provides complete information about the shoe and fun exercise regimes.


Upper
Meshed upper with an inner meshed bootie for absolute comfort and breathability
Strategically placed synthetic leather overlays for absolute comfort, support and style
Padded and meshed collar and tongue
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit

Midsole
High durometer cradle progressive suspension midsole that disperses weight and offers a stabilising platform for high-density activities
Low durometer Kinetic Core midsole in the heel to amplify roll effect and create natural instability to intensify muscle activity
Resalyte for cushioned comfort and enhanced impact protection

Outsole
High density rubber outsole with flex groove technology to increase flexibility

Shoe care
Wipe surface with a dry, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Skechers Men USA Brown Shoe
description:
The casual slip-on shoe is back with a bang with the Spinal-Intrusion from skechers. Crafted from a smooth leather upper with stylishly dyed overlays, this shoe makes for a great addition to your casual wardrobe.

Upper
Leather upper with overlays
Slip-on style for ease of wear
Elastic gores on the sides of the tongue to offers a customised Fit
Ergonomically padded footbed for all-day comfort

Midsole
Phylon midsole for lightweight comfort and impact protection


Outsole
TPR outsole with a transparent fabric forefoot that has strategically placed lugs, and lugs on the heel for absolute grip and traction

Shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Use a branded leather conditioner if needed
Do not store in direct sunlight

description:
In a low profile silhouette with absolute visual appeal, this shoe from skechers makes for a perfect addition to your casual wardrobe. The smooth leather and suede upper with stitch detailing gives it a rugged look, making it a fab buy.

description:
Always look good in your neighborhood with the skechers Liquid-Roggers shoe. Made of a smooth leather upper in a lace up casual sneaker design, it's a great addition to the wardrobe of the man of style.

Upper
· Smooth leather upper with a polished look
· Lace-up system for a snug ··Fit

description:
With a sleek and sporty look, this Lil'd-Sunkiss sneaker from skechers comes with a generously padded, moisture-wicking mesh lining that keeps you fresh and comfortable all day. The low profile midsole and flexible traction outsole makes this a great reason to buy.

Mesh upper wuth strategically placed synthetic overlays for lightweight comfort
Lace-ups for a snug, customised Fit
Padded and meshed tongue and collar for snug comfort
